params.name: binaryFile
params.description: A file in the format of the 8-bit unsigned integer array.

params.name: fields
params.description: A list of field values.

InsertAndReplaceContentControls.name: InsertAndReplaceContentControls
InsertAndReplaceContentControls.description: Inserts the content control containing data. The data is specified by the JS code for {@link /docbuilder/basic Document Builder}, or by a link to the shared document.

params.name: arrDocuments
params.description: An array of properties and contents of the content control.

params.name: arrDocuments
params.description: An array of content control internal IDs. Example: [{"InternalId": "5_556"}].

GetAllContentControls.name: GetAllContentControls
GetAllContentControls.description: Returns information about all the content controls that have been added to the page.

RemoveContentControl.name: RemoveContentControl
RemoveContentControl.description: Removes the currently selected content control retaining all its contents. The content control where the mouse cursor is currently positioned will be removed.

params.name: InternalId
params.description: A unique internal identifier of the content control.

GetCurrentContentControl.name: GetCurrentContentControl
GetCurrentContentControl.description: Returns an identifier of the selected content control (i.e. the content control where the mouse cursor is currently positioned).

params.name: contentFormat
params.description: The content format ("none", "text", "html", "ole" or "desktop").

params.name: id
params.description: A unique internal identifier of the content control.

MoveCursorToContentControl.name: MoveCursorToContentControl
MoveCursorToContentControl.description: Moves a cursor to the specified content control.

params.name: id
params.description: A unique internal identifier of the content control.

params.name: isBegin
params.description: Defines if the cursor position changes in the content control. By default, a cursor will be placed to the content control begin (false).

RemoveSelectedContent.name: RemoveSelectedContent
RemoveSelectedContent.description: Removes the selected content from the document.

params.name: oCommentData
params.description: An object which contains the comment data.

MoveCursorToStart.name: MoveCursorToStart
MoveCursorToStart.description: Moves a cursor to the beginning of the current editing area (document body, footer/header, footnote, or autoshape). This method is similar to pressing the Ctrl + Home keyboard shortcut.

params.name: isMoveToMainContent
params.description: This flag ignores the current position and always moves a cursor to the beginning of the document body.

MoveCursorToEnd.name: MoveCursorToEnd
MoveCursorToEnd.description: Moves a cursor to the end of the current editing area (document body, footer/header, footnote, or autoshape). This method is similar to pressing the Ctrl + End keyboard shortcut.

params.name: isMoveToMainContent
params.description: This flag ignores the current position and always moves a cursor to the end of the document body.

params.name: oProperties
params.description: An object which contains the search and replacement strings.

params.name: oProperties.searchString
params.description: The search string.

params.name: oProperties.replaceString
params.description: The replacement string.

params.name: oProperties.matchCase
params.description: Case sensitive or not.

GetFileHTML.name: GetFileHTML
GetFileHTML.description: Returns file content in the HTML format.

GetAllComments.name: GetAllComments
GetAllComments.description: Returns all the comments from the document.

params.name: arrIds
params.description: An array which contains the IDs of the specified comments.

params.name: sId
params.description: The comment ID.

params.name: oCommentData
params.description: An object which contains the new comment data.

MoveToComment.name: MoveToComment
MoveToComment.description: Moves a cursor to the specified comment.

params.name: sId
params.description: The comment ID.

SetDisplayModeInReview.name: SetDisplayModeInReview
SetDisplayModeInReview.description: Sets the display mode for track changes.

params.name: sMode
params.description:
The display mode:

  • edit - all changes are displayed,
  • simple - all changes are displayed but the balloons are turned off,
  • final - all accepted changes are displayed,
  • original - all rejected changes are displayed.

AddContentControl.name: AddContentControl
AddContentControl.description: Adds an empty content control to the document.

params.name: type
params.description: A numeric value that specifies the content control type. It can have one of the following values: 1 (block), 2 (inline), 3 (row), or 4 (cell).

params.name: commonPr
params.description: The common content control properties.

AddContentControlCheckBox.name: AddContentControlCheckBox
AddContentControlCheckBox.description: Adds an empty content control checkbox to the document.

params.name: checkBoxPr
params.description: The content control checkbox properties.

params.name: commonPr
params.description: The common content control properties.

AddContentControlPicture.name: AddContentControlPicture
AddContentControlPicture.description: Adds an empty content control picture to the document.

params.name: commonPr
params.description: The common content control properties.

AddContentControlList.name: AddContentControlList
AddContentControlList.description: Adds an empty content control list to the document.

params.name: type
params.description: A numeric value that specifies the content control type. It can have one of the following values: 1 (combo box), 0 (dropdown list).

params.name: List
params.description: A list of the content control elements that consists of two items: Display - an item that will be displayed to the user in the content control list, Value - a value of each item from the content control list.

params.name: commonPr
params.description: The common content control properties.

AddContentControlDatePicker.name: AddContentControlDatePicker
AddContentControlDatePicker.description: Adds an empty content control datepicker to the document.

params.name: datePickerPr
params.description: The content control datepicker properties.

params.name: commonPr
params.description: The common content control properties.

GetAllOleObjects.name: GetAllOleObjects
GetAllOleObjects.description: Returns all OLE object data for objects which can be opened by the specified plugin. If sPluginId is not defined, this method returns all OLE objects contained in the currrent document.

params.name: sPluginId
params.description: Plugin identifier. It must be of the asc.{UUID} type.

RemoveOleObject.name: RemoveOleObject
RemoveOleObject.description: Removes the OLE object from the document by its internal ID.

params.name: sInternalId
params.description: The OLE object identifier which is used to work with OLE object added to the document.

RemoveOleObjects.name: RemoveOleObjects
RemoveOleObjects.description: Removes several OLE objects from the document by their internal IDs.

params.name: arrObjects
params.description: An array of the identifiers which are used to work with OLE objects added to the document. Example: [{"InternalId": "5_556"}].

params.name: id
params.description: The OLE object identifier which is used to work with OLE object added to the document.

InsertOleObject.name: InsertOleObject
InsertOleObject.description: Inserts the OLE object at the current document position.

params.name: NewObject
params.description: The OLEObjectData object.

params.name: bSelect
params.description: Defines if the OLE object will be selected after inserting into the document (true) or not (false).

ChangeOleObject.name: ChangeOleObject
ChangeOleObject.description: Changes the OLE object with the InternalId specified in OLE object data.

params.name: ObjectData
params.description: The OLEObjectData object.

ChangeOleObjects.name: ChangeOleObjects
ChangeOleObjects.description: Changes multiple OLE objects with the InternalIds specified in OLE object data.

params.name: arrObjectData
params.description: An array of OLE object data.

params.name: isAll
params.description: Specifies if all changes will be accepted (true) or only changes from the current selection (false).

params.name: isAll
params.description: Specifies if all changes will be rejected (true) or only changes from the current selection (false).

params.name: isForward
params.description: Specifies whether to navigate to the next (true) or previous (false) review change.

GetAllAddinFields.name: GetAllAddinFields
GetAllAddinFields.description: Returns all addin fields from the current document.

UpdateAddinFields.name: UpdateAddinFields
UpdateAddinFields.description: Updates the addin fields with the specified data.

params.name: arrData
params.description: An array of addin field data.

AddAddinField.name: AddAddinField
AddAddinField.description: Creates a new addin field with the data specified in the request.

params.name: data
params.description: Addin field data.

RemoveFieldWrapper.name: RemoveFieldWrapper
RemoveFieldWrapper.description: Removes a field wrapper, leaving only the field content.

params.name: fieldId
params.description: Field ID. If it is not specified, then the wrapper of the current field is removed.

params.name: restrictions
params.description: The document editing restrictions.

params.name: type
params.description: Specifies if the whole word or only its part will be returned.

ReplaceCurrentWord.name: ReplaceCurrentWord
ReplaceCurrentWord.description: Replaces the current word with the specified string.

params.name: replaceString
params.description: Replacement string.

params.name: type
params.description: Specifies if the whole word or only its part will be replaced.

params.name: type
params.description: Specifies if the whole sentence or only its part will be returned.

ReplaceCurrentSentence.name: ReplaceCurrentSentence
ReplaceCurrentSentence.description: Replaces the current sentence with the specified string.

params.name: replaceString
params.description: Replacement string.

params.name: type
params.description: Specifies if the whole sentence or only its part will be replaced.
